column1: I really do prefer the startup environment. I've been working for about 15 years for these types of companies.
I used to work to a Pension Fund and Banking institution and the hierarchy is so rigid that a simple number format in a report interface consumed a lot effort in order to get it approved
I like the freedom of the ideas flow
column2: We are closer to the founder that loves their business and are in general more open to assimilate new concepts and apply them faster.
